titles.title: ACCESS Act of 2011
To amend title 49, United States Code, to establish additional goals for airport master plans, and for other purposes.
ACCESS Act of 2011
Airport Master Plan Customer Convenience Enhancement, Security, and Sustainability Act of 2011

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Transportation and Infrastructure.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Aviation.

bill.summary: Airport Master Plan Customer Convenience Enhancement, Security, and Sustainability Act of 2011 or ACCESS Act 2011 - Directs the Secretary of Transportation (DOT) to encourage (including through Federal Aviation Administration [FAA] advisory circulars) airport sponsors and state and local officials in the development of their airport master plans to consider as additional goals: (1) customer service, and (2) access to airport grounds and airport facilities.
